name: CPTemplateApplicationScene
desc: A CarPlay scene that controls your app’s user interface.

items.name: var delegate: CPTemplateApplicationSceneDelegate?
items.desc: The object that receives the scene’s life-cycle events.

items.name: protocol CPTemplateApplicationSceneDelegate
items.desc: The methods for responding to the life cycle events of your app’s scene.

items.name: var interfaceController: CPInterfaceController
items.desc: The controller that manages the scene’s user interface.

items.name: class CPInterfaceController
items.desc: A controller that manages the templates for constructing a scene’s user interface.

items.name: var carWindow: CPWindow
items.desc: The window that belongs to the scene.

items.name: class CPWindow
items.desc: A window that displays its content on the CarPlay screen.
